description: Lists all imported portfolios for which account-to-account shares were accepted by this account. By specifying the PortfolioShareType, you can list portfolios for which organizational shares were accepted by this account.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: PortfolioShareType
parameters.description: The type of shared portfolios to list. The default is to list imported portfolios. AWS_ORGANIZATIONS - List portfolios accepted and shared via organizational sharing by the management account or delegated administrator of your organization. AWS_SERVICECATALOG - Deprecated type. IMPORTED - List imported portfolios that have been accepted and shared through account-to-account sharing.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The ARN assigned to the portfolio.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name to use for display purposes.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time stamp of the creation time.

nested_items.name: ProviderName
nested_items.description: The name of the portfolio provider.

nested_items.name: NextPageToken
nested_items.description: The page token to use to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.
